channel.title: Running 317 on 64bit
channel.description:
I cant run my 64bit laptop or pc on 317 servers the cmd pops up and says this
[code] The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Gui. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Running 317 on 64bit
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


^^^^My new guide for this!

Read full topic

item.title: Running 317 on 64bit
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Edit your compiler and find where it has the class path to the JDk, after Program Files put space.

That should do it!

Read full topic

item.title: Running 317 on 64bit
item.dc:creator: @cruel_ko cruel ko
item.description:
@cruel_ko wrote:

I cant run my 64bit laptop or pc on 317 servers the cmd pops up and says this

The system cannot find the path specified.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Gui
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Gui
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: Gui.  Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .
